original_text: Use gold to make images of two cherubs. Use a hammer to make them the right shape. They will stand at the two ends of the lid.
korean_text: 금으로 그룹 둘을 속죄소 두 끝에 쳐서 만들되

sentences.original_text: Use gold to make images of two cherubs.
Use a hammer to make them the right shape.
They will stand at the two ends of the lid.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 뚜껑의 두 끝에 서 있을 것입니다.
